{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = AX6000 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AX6000 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/us/home-networking/wifi-router/archer-ax6000/ |sp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/Archer-AX6000/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_AX6000 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer AX6000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.0 |subrevision = (US) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX60002R |series = Archer |type = wireless router |sernum = 218A |fcc_id = TE7AX6000 |icid = 8853A-AX6000 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050503249 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1735, 4AT-15 Z2AW; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;F59L1G81MA-25T; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BYMA; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54991E;BCM54991EB0KFSBG; |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG, TN1717 P21, 218-11 P3 W; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B0:BE:76 |oui = B0:BE:76
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 (Type A), USB 3.0 (Type C), |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, 1024QAM, VHT160, MU-MIMO, IFTTT, Alexa, Bluetooth 5.0, LACP, Link Aggregation, Band Steering, DFS, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN HP FEM;Qorvo;QRR1;;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN HP FEM;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;85743, 66465, 1808 MX;4; ,,, Bluetooth 5.0 Chip;Cypress;CYW20704;20704UA2, KFFB1G, UN1646 P12, 639581 P3;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = http://tplinkwifi.net |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/10/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 350 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07L56SN8M |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1824 P21, 6TV-01 B2 W; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1824 P21, 6TV-01 B2 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 4804 |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The 2.5Gbps WAN chip's ID is not legible in the FCC internal photos. :[[Broadcom]] BCM54991EB0 is just a guess ([https://file.hkepc.net/2019/01/source/23163235551096275390.jpg image]).
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.tp-link.com/ro/news-details-18054.html ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 and AX11000 Routers Series'' on '''TP-LINK'''] (RO) *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13697/tplink-announces-archer-ax6000-and-ax11000-wifi-6-80211ax-routers ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 and AX11000 Wi-Fi 6 Routers'' on '''AnandTech''']
===Reviews=== *[https://www.hkepc.com/17630/%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4_Multi_Gigabit_%E9%80%A3%E6%8E%A5_TP-LINK_Archer_AX6000 ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 Multi Gigabit Router'' on '''HKEPC'''] (CN) :OUI: B0:BE:76 ([https://file.hkepc.net/2019/01/source/1717184727880127350.jpg Label], [https://file.hkepc.net/2019/01/source/2316323454298622910.jpg PCB images])
